activities.loc: Grant County Courthouse - Br. II - 2nd Floor

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Demetrius Kenneth Mims

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 9, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Demetrius Kenneth Mims in court.  Attorney Lui Moefu in court for Demetrius Kenneth Mims.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin. Waiver of preliminary hearing filed. Court reviews waiver and finds defendant freely and knowingly waives right to preliminary hearing. Court binds over for trial. Information filed. Defendant waives reading and stands mute. Court enters not guilty plea(s). Status date set.
Status conference scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on October 3, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 26, 2022 at 08:45 am.

Defendant Demetrius Kenneth Mims not in court.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin. Warrant authorized on State's motion. Defendant appears late. Warrant withdrawn. Defendant does not qualify for SPD. He's attempting to get a loan to retain counsel but not having much success. Court appointed counsel requested. Court appoints Attorney Hana Moefu. Court orders repayment of $25 per week by wage assignment. Court sets preliminary hearing. Court finds good cause to extend time limits for preliminary hearing due to appointment of counsel.
Status conference on September 12, 2022 at 11:30 am.

Defendant Demetrius Kenneth Mims appeared by video, in custody from Grant County Jail.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Trevor Paulson appears for today's hearing only. Court explains charges, penalties, and right to counsel. Defendant does not qualify for SPD. State requests a signature bond. Attorney Paulson does not object. Court heard and orders $250 signature bond. Status date set.
